roleset.name: explain, explain visually, metaphorically, or with examples
roleset.note: ILLUSTRATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'illustrate' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from illustrate.01-v predicate notes)
ILLUSTRATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to illustrate.01. Vn class transfer_mesg-37.1.1. Framed by Katie. (from illustration.01-n)

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: But GM's results also illustrate the increasing diversity of its operations.
example.arg: the increasing diversity of its operations

example.name: ARG2
example.text: A panic had come since Mr. Semple had died, which-1 *trace*-1 had illustrated to him very clearly what an uncertain thing the brokerage business was.
example.arg: what an uncertain thing the brokerage business was.

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: an illustration of Cheng's whole approach
